citations.narrative:
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on13-Apr-18 at 11:45 AM.
Inspector arrived at facility, called out at the gate with no response and called the main business number and left a
message. After waiting half an hour, there was no response.

narrative:
2.38(b)
MISCELLANEOUS.
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on13-Apr-18 at 11:45 AM.
Inspector arrived at facility, called out at the gate with no response and called the main business number and left a
message.  After waiting half an hour, there was no response.
